data.message: You won't let me send you a PM so I'll air my gripe here then, for the past month maybe more I have not been alerted to people's posts much and when I write on their page they get no notifications of my replys. Do you plan to fix this soon? Do you even care? Please don't tell me to check my settings, it's not that. Everyone is having the same issue its YOU. Fix it would you?

replies.message: Hey, Obaida. Thanks for bringing this to our attention. This sounds like a feature issue. Please help us track these issues and submit the problem to support through our Help Center: http://bit.ly/2evcFrc. -Rhea
I would use twitter. Eberything posted is seen by your whole list. This will be the death of this platform.
Why can't FB fix the problems people are having before bringing in new changes all the time!  Do you even care FB?
